name: @valcome/ng-elements
description: A collection of angular components, directives, services and more, which we use in our projects

scripts.postversion: git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade npm version" && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && cd ../../dist/ng-elements && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && cd ../../dist/ng-elements && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && cd ../../dist/ng-elements && npm publish

author: Valcome Analytics
